author: holiman
content: As I said on the last ACD call - we'd like to get rid of `eth64` now. Pinging <@!429719902363058177> <@!489256758989029405> <@!213672586264051717> and <@456226577798135808> -- is everyone now onboard with `eth65` ok? cc <@!206016661470314496>

author: Deleted User
content: We have imported eth/66 support from geth, and we will also only support eth/66 and higher in the sentry (not released yet, but "soon") - this will simplify the code

author: vorot93
content: Can confirm for Rust sentry as well

author: vorot93
content: More than that, Rust sentry does not support eth64
